### Added
- Add a check if VPA capabilities exist in the first place.
### Changed
- Upgrade ATS to `v0.2.9`
- Bump upstream flux toolkit version to from `v0.35.0` to `v0.36.0`. There are
  no breaking changes.
- Change resource requests & limits.
